metadata.title: CVE-2018-20060 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: urllib3 before version 1.23 does not remove the Authorization HTTP header when following a cross-origin redirect (i.e., a redirect that differs in host, port, or scheme). This can allow for credentials in the Authorization header to be exposed to unintended hosts or transmitted in cleartext.

criterions.comment: python-urllib3 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.24-1').
